text:
Blerta Veseli (born September 5, 1997 in Gjilan, Kosovo) is a Kosovar model, architect and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Universe Kosovo 2020.
Personal life.
Veseli was born on September 5, 1997 in Gjilan. She is a student of architecture.
Pageantry.
Veseli was crowned Miss Universe Kosovo 2020 was crowned Miss Universe Kosovo 2020 in a national competition held on September 18, 2020 at the Adorions Palace in Tirana. She will represent Kosovo at Miss Universe 2020.
